game.title: Quest for the Golden Apple
game.objective: Collect 10 golden apples from the Enchanted Orchard.
game.description: The Golden Apples are said to grant eternal youth and vitality. They are guarded by magical creatures in the Enchanted Orchard, deep within the Mystic Forest.

task.objective: Speak to Morgana Le Fay and accept the quest.
task.description: Find Morgana Le Fay in the heart of Camelot and speak to her about the Golden Apples.

task.objective: Reach the Enchanted Orchard in the Mystic Forest.
task.description: Make your way through the winding paths of the forest to reach the Enchanted Orchard.

task.objective: Collect 10 golden apples from the trees in the orchard.
task.description: The magical creatures may try to stop you, but do not let them distract you. Focus on collecting as many golden apples as possible before they spoil.

task.objective: Return to Morgana Le Fay with the golden apples.
task.description: Bring the 10 golden apples back to Morgana Le Fay in Camelot to complete the quest and claim your reward.
